title: Deer Dancer
description: In this mesmerizing picture book from the author of the New York Times bestselling Stars , a young ballerina finds dancing inspiration in the natural world.There’s a place I go that’s green and grass,a place I thought that no one knew—until the deer came.This gorgeous picture book from celebrated author Mary Lyn Ray features luminous and evocative art from Lauren Stringer and will capture the hearts of young dancers everywhere.
author: Mary Lyn Ray
